transformation_info.action_detailed_instructions: Look up description based on Z30_call_no_type

1. Replace the following strings with a space: $$h, $$i, $$j, $$k, $$l, $$m
2. Remove leading and trailing spaces.

transformation_steps.target_attribute: - Library Item Location Alternative Sort Normalized Call Number
- Library Item Alternate Enumeration Level 1 Text
- Library Item Alternate Enumeration Level 2 Text
- Library Item Actual Material Form Code
- Library Item Actual Process Status Code
Library Item Most Recent Loan Event Date

transformation_info.action_detailed_instructions:
FOR Insert trigger in Z35:
IF Z35-EVENT-TYPE = 50|52|54|56|91
     identify relevant item {
       JOIN 
         Z35_REC_KEY = SUBSTR(Z30_REC_KEY,1,9) AND
         Z35_ITEM_SEQUENCE = SUBSTR(Z30_REC_KEY,10,15)
         }
     update value
ELSE 
     do nothing
